title: No More Rim Brakes or 105 (Mostly): How Do Pro Women’s Team Bikes Stack Up to the Men’s?
content:
We sent Shoddy Dave to the Itzulia Women, the three-day stage race in the Basque country, to investigate if team's technical sponsors are upping their game with supplying the best of the best.

Read the full article at No More Rim Brakes or 105 (Mostly): How Do Pro Women’s Team Bikes Stack Up to the Men’s? on Velo.
author: Dave Everett
